* Howto:

 # You will need IntelliJ (9, 10 and 11) to work with the plugin-code, so download and install IntelliJ IC distribution and source code:   
  * [http://download.jetbrains.com/idea/ideaIC-9.0.4.exe IntelliJ 9.0.4 IC] and  [http://download.jetbrains.com/idea/ideaIC-9.0.4-src.tar.bz2 IntelliJ 9.0.4 IC Sources] 
  * [http://download.jetbrains.com/idea/ideaIC-10.5.4.exe IntelliJ 10.5.4 IC] and  [http://download.jetbrains.com/idea/ideaIC-10.5.4-src.tar.bz2 IntelliJ 10.5.4 IC Sources]
  * [http://download.jetbrains.com/idea/ideaIC-11.0.2.exe IntelliJ 11.0.2 IC] and  [http://download.jetbrains.com/idea/ideaIC-11.0.2-src.tar.bz2 IntelliJ 11.0.2 IC Sources]
 # svn checkout from http://code.google.com/p/intellij-maven/source/browse/#svn%2Ftrunk%2Fintellij-maven   
 # Create new profile in pom.xml in intellij-maven directory for youself like existing one:
   <code language="xml">
   {{{
   <profile>
      <id>mpl</id>
      <activation>
        <property>
          <name>env.COMPUTERNAME</name>
          <value>MOSKAU</value>
        </property>
      </activation>
      <properties>
        <idea9.home>D:/Projekte/Idea/ideaIC-95.627</idea9.home>
        <idea10.home>D:/Projekte/Idea/ideaIC-107.777</idea10.home>
        <idea11.home>D:/Projekte/Idea/ideaIC-117.418</idea11.home>
      </properties>
    </profile>
   }}}
   </code>    
   Use your own directories for idea9, idea10 and idea11 places!
    
 # run "mvn clean" and "mvn install" in intellij-maven directory. Check for successful build.
 # run "mvn clean" and "mvn install -DIntelliJ=10" in intellij-maven directory. Check for successful build.
 # run "mvn clean" and "mvn install -DIntelliJ=9" in intellij-maven directory. Check for successful build.

   --> now you should be able to build lombok-intellij-plugin with maven on command line.

 # Install new Idea-plugin: "IntelliJ plugin modul maven importer" (http://plugins.intellij.net/plugin/?idea&id=7054) (Plugin is available in IntelliJ-IDEA)
 # Setup JDK in IntelliJ
 # Setup IntelliJ Idea plugin SDKs (9, 10 and 11) in IntelliJ

 # Import lombok-intellij-plugin projekt as maven project.
 # Check and change as needed Projekt-JDK and Plugin-JDK for plugin modul in IntelliJ for imported lombok-intellij-plugin projekt

   --> now you should be able to build lombok-intellij-plugin with IntelliJ-Idea too.
